titles.title: To amend chapter 84 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain Federal annuity computations are adjusted by 1 percent relating to periods of receiving disability payments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/26/2002--Introduced. Amends basic annuity computation provisions under the Federal Employees' Retirement System to provide that the percentage otherwise applicable for a computation that includes, in the aggregate, at least two months of credit for any period of receiving disability compensation benefits shall be increased by one percentage point.
